resources.string: We need to access your camera and storage to show this feature. Pwease grant?
Text cannot be empty, please input something
This is an error message. There are many errors in this world but this one is unique because it has only one eyes. Prepare for the holy feast and say your prayers.
A warning message\'s job is to warn your about the impending occurrence. Sometimes it is negligible, other times it is quite dangerous.
I am here to inform you about the information that is not relevant to any other information that you have received throughout your journey.
Squirtle is one of the three starter pokemon in Gen 1 with water element
Bulbasaur is one of the three starter pokemon in Gen 1 with leaf element
Charmander is one of the three starter pokemon in Gen 1 with fire element
Pikachu is one of the most iconic pokemon in the series. It appear many times in the anime and also it was an electric rat
Mew is one of the many legendary pokemons
Snorlax likes to sleep. His appearance in the pokemon game series often includes blocking your path towards your next destination.
Eevee is a pokemon that has the most number of evolution branches
Espeon is a physic type evolution branching from Eevee
Flaeron is a fire type evolution branching from Eevee
Glaceon is an Ice type evolution branching from Eevee
Jolteon is an Electric type evolution branching from Eevee
Leafeon is a leaf type evolution branching from Eevee
Sylveon is a fairy type evolution branching from Eevee
Vaporeon is a water type evolution branching from Eevee
Umbreon is a dark type evolution branching from Eevee
